issue.message: This androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout should use `android:layout_height="wrap_content"`
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.bumptech.glide.request.target.NotificationTarget)
Limit vector icons sizes to 200×200 to keep icon drawing fast; see https://developer.android.com/studio/write/vector-asset-studio#when for more
Should use "`sp`" instead of "`dp`" for text sizes
